children.text: {{ (() => { const b = fetchStandupForToday.data.records.filter(r => r.fields.Blocked && r.fields.Blocked.indexOf(appsmith.user.name) >= 0).map(r => r.fields.Name); return b.length === 0 ? "" : (b.join(", ") + " " + (b.length > 1 ? "are" : "is") + " blocked on you."); })() }}

children.items: {{fetchStandupForToday.data.records.map((row) => {return {...row.fields, "Created At": row.createdTime};}).filter((row) => { return Input1.text ? row.Name.toLowerCase().includes(Input1.text.toLowerCase()) : (Select1.selectedOptionValue ? row.Pod == Select1.selectedOptionValue : true) })}}

children.text: {{get_force_roster.data.records.reduce((acc,row) => { acc = row.fields.ForceCommander === appsmith.user.name.split(" ")[0] || row.fields.ForceHero === appsmith.user.name.split(" ")[0] ? acc + 1 : acc; return acc; }, 0) < 3 ? "It looks like you haven't signed up for A-Force recently. Sign Up Here!" : "You've been Active on A-Force! Check your stats"}}

Any issue that needs to be fixed an verified within 24 hrs for a certain target environment is a hotfix

Issues will show up here with the lable `hotfix`, These issues should also have the environment label (Production / Release).

The issue will be removed from the list once the `verified` label is added to it by the QA.
